words.def: a deliberate discourteous act (usually as an expression of anger or disapproval)
(chemistry) an ionic compound that resists changes in its pH
A fish, the Eurasian ruffe  and other species in the same genus.
an external body part consisting of feathers or hair about the neck of a bird or other animal
a person who is not very intelligent or interested in culture
A plump young person or child.
the dressed hairy coat of a mammal
(sports) the chief official (as in boxing or American football) who is expected to ensure fair play
`Johnny' was applied as a nickname for Confederate soldiers by the Federal soldiers in the American Civil War
seed vessel having hooks or prickles
European strong-scented perennial herb with grey-green bitter-tasting leaves
Library American Library Association  abbreviation for forty-eighth, a book size 7. 5-10 cm in height; a book of that height.
a light strong brittle grey toxic bivalent metallic element
a rare heavy polyvalent metallic element that resembles manganese chemically and is used in some alloys
a trivalent metallic element of the rare earth group
